title: Cash Crops
author: Kevin Voigt
cleaned_text: July 7, 2006 12:01 am ET After two unsuccessful attempts to have a child through in vitro fertilization, Melbourne resident Michelle Harrison was willing to try anything. So while getting fertility treatments at Melbourne IVF clinic, she also visited the Melbourne Holistic Health Group for a course of acupuncture. The results were two-fold: the birth in January of Caitlin Aleisha Harrison and, unexpectedly, newfound relief from her annual allergy attacks. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
